ca.cmput301f13t03.adventure_datetime.model

Class StoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cmput301f13t03.adventure_datetime.model.StoryManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStoryModelDirector, IStoryModelPresenter

    public final class StoryManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStoryModelPresenter, IStoryModelDirector
    Manages all transactions between views, controllers, and models. Creates new Stories, StoryFragments, etc. Fetches and caches Stories and StoryFragments

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StoryManager(android.content.Context context)
      Create a new story manager and initializes other components using the provided context.
